03_central_limit_theorem/02_normal/06_betweenarea_from_x_v3

Random variable \(H\) is normally distributed with mean \(\mu = 450\) and standard deviation \(\sigma = 100\). \[H = \text{N}(450,\,100) \] Evaluate \(P\left(350 < X < 540\right)\). In other words, what is the probability that \(H\) is between \(350\) and \(540\)?
